discussion.author: CohenCyril
discussion.comment: Hi @anton-trunov, will you soon update fcsl-pcm and lemma-overloading or their opam metadata to make them compile with Coq 8.13 or should we temporarily remove the coq 8.13  from mathcomp CI?

discussion.author: pi8027
discussion.comment: I commented out `ci-fcsl-pcm-8.13` and `ci-lemma-overloading-8.13` so that we can merge this.

discussion.author: anton-trunov
discussion.comment: Hi @pi8027! I just updated `lemma-overloading`'s meta-data to Coq 8.13: https://github.com/coq-community/lemma-overloading/pull/65 so it should work now. Sorry for the delay.

tags.description: Issue or PR about the CI. (Gitlab CI or CI of dependencies problems linked with math-comp)
